description: Try our easy to follow Daly Potato Mild Curry Potato Salad With Lamb Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Potato salad,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Easter,Peanut free
name: Daly Potato Mild Curry Potato Salad With Lamb Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tomatoes, red onion and rocket in a bowl, drizzle with olive oil.
In a bowl whisk 1 teaspoon olive oil, 1 clove garlic crushed, sumac and yoghurt, season with salt and pepper, set aside.
Sprinkle the lamb cutlets with salt and pepper.
Heat fry pan on high, add olive oil, lamb cutlets and garlic cloves.
Fry the lamb until golden-brown and cooked to your liking, 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove from the pan and set aside to rest in a warm place.
Assemble plate with potato salad, rocket salad and lamb cutlets.
Drizzle sumac yoghurt over lamb and rocket salad.
